articles.author: Orla McCaffrey, Will Feuer
articles.title: Bank of America to Cut Overdraft Fees to $10 From $35 - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Regulators, politicians have been pressuring banks on fees; JPMorgan, Ally Financial have already announced changes
articles.content:
Bank of America Corp. said Tuesday it would cut overdraft fees to $10 from $35 beginning in May, following other big banks that have rolled back or ditched such charges.
Overdraft fees, which are ch… [+482 chars]

articles.author: Jim Geraghty
articles.title: This Omicron wave is NOT like the others. America needs to ditch debilitating terror: JIM GERAGHTY - Daily Mail
articles.description: GERAGHTY: While we may have sympathy for those unable to let go of an all-consuming fear, it is not a rational response, and it has long ago stopped being a healthy response.
articles.content:
The Omicron variant has fundamentally changed the dynamics of this pandemic and it is blaring a wake-up call to Americans that the 'Covid Zero' philosophy and policies are now absurdly unworkable.

articles.title: Common Cold Can Protect Against Coronavirus, Study Finds - Voice of America
articles.description: U.S adults usually catch one or two common colds a year. They’re usually little more than an annoyance, but new research suggests they may offer some protection from a virus that’s much more dangerous. Henry Ridgwell reports from London.

articles.title: Történelmi El Clásico a sivatag kellős közepén - Goal.com
articles.description: The Blues boss has been making use of an American forward’s versatility and sees benefits to Pulisic's ability to fill a number of different positions.
